title: Autio can entertain and educate you during road trips with its location-based audio stories
content:
Macworld

Have you ever gone to a historic landmark like the Alamo or Colonial Williamsburg and learned about those destinations with audio stories? You can now experience something similar while driving around with Autio.

Whether you’re driving to the beaches of South Carolina or have a weekend trip to New England planned this summer, Autio can keep you entertained while driving with its professionally-narrated and location-based stories. Now, plans are discounted at half off or more.

Make road trips more fun and engage in new destinations with Autio’s over 23,000 stories about U.S. hotspots and destinations. Its audio stories are narrated by Kevin Costner (from Yellowstone!), Phil Jackson, and more.

Autio’s constantly adding to its library, and stories are updated and added weekly, so you don’t listen to the same thing twice.

Its audio stories are designed to teach listeners about the history, sports, culture, music, and more of the place they’re driving to (or from). Discover lesser-known facts about your destinations and share them with friends or family when you return. 

If you’re driving through an area with a bad connection or traveling via plane, you can also download Autio’s stories to listen to offline.

Learn fun facts and stories about U.S. destinations with Autio. You have until May 31 at 11:59 PM Pacific to grab this Memorial Day deal on the following Autio plans:

  • Autio Unlimited Plan 5-Year Subscription for $59.97.
  • Autio Unlimited Plan  Lifetime Subscription $149.97.
